this_title: Mickey's Fun Songs: Let's Go to the Circus
trans_title: 米奇的趣味歌曲：让我们去马戏团
introduction: Mickey, Minnie, Donald, Goofy, and the Fun Song Kids head to the circus to participate in a behind-the-scenes tour of the greatest Show on Earth, the Ringling Bros. and Banum and Bailey Circus. Songs include: "Be a Clown", "Join the Circus", "The Man on the Flying Trapeze", "Upside Down", and 9 more fun-filled songs!
chinese_title: 米奇的趣味歌曲：让我们去马戏团
foreign_title: Mickey's Fun Songs: Let's Go to the Circus
